lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: THIS I can do.

lender.name: Chargo
lender.loan_because: business has a social responsibility to give back to the community. By expanding that to a global community we assist those that need it most lessening tensions throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: Provide trucks that move goods throughout North America.

lender.name: Brynne
lender.loan_because: This was a gift and it is the first I knew there was such an organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a small Family owned Oregon Ski Area (Hoodoo Ski Area) in the Winter and in the spring, summer and fall the same company is a campground concessionaire for the US Forest Service. We managed over 70 USFS campgrounds and 4 "Hoodoo owned" RV parks in the mid Cascade mountain range in Oregon. People tent camp or use their motorhome/camper to stay in the forests by lakes, rivers or reservoirs.

lender.name: Gene Hertel
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupation: Support Coordinator for AFS Intercultural Programs
lender.occupational_info: I work for a student exchange organization. We bring high school aged students to come study in the USA for a year and we send American students to different countries all over the world to study. In my specific position, I deal with all the problems that our participants experience when they are on the program.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: II've been blessed, and I want to share the blessing.

lender.name: stephen
lender.occupational_info: Computer software

lender.name: KidCare America of Rolla
lender.loan_because: we feel there is no better way to show God\'s love through Jesus Christ than by giving from our heart.
lender.occupational_info: We are a program where adults spend time with kids to help them through life.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I have been given many opportunities and would like to give back to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I currently run my own disc jockey business but I dabble in some other things as well.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: People need it!

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to support men and women who are working to improve their lives.

lender.name: Frederic
lender.loan_because: Instead of using some of my money for my advertisements, maybe a part of it will help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Building software for rich people, to help them being richer...

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by Mary\'s courage and ambition. I wanted to encourage her to keep doing all that she can to make life better for herself, her family and her community.
lender.occupational_info: My group BW2Network hosts Health, wealth and fitness workshops to mentor, coach and educate women entreprenuers. We are five women over 40 who strongly believe in helping our community to grow.

lender.name: Diva
lender.loan_because: I was in need for many years as a single mother and the universe has blessed me over and over again... now , I want to give back in a way that actually makes a difference to a specific person! We all can help each other and the world becomes a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales and I love it! I love what I do and want to be more successful to give back more and more!

lender.name: Emilio
lender.loan_because: I want others to benefit from the opportunities that I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others how to speak other languages.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to invest directly in real projects I can see and understand instead of just donating to non-profit organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with businesses and investment groups on how to use environmental performance to create competitive advantage.

lender.name: Mitsch Family
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Our small business works with major companies in the US and globally, helping to accelerate leadership development and allow people be more productive in all aspects of their lives.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Health, happiness and hope.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: This is the most satisfaction for the dollar that I see out there. A great organization.
lender.occupational_info: I buy houses and fix them up.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: i feel that it is a good way to show that I care to the world

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to

lender.name: Tony castellon
lender.loan_because: I loaon because I can, and God give me the oportunity to live in the greatest country in the wide world USA. I came here with nothing, now I can help others in need. GOD Bless United States of America, Land of the Free and the Home of the Brave.
lender.occupational_info: I love to help, specially those that live in third world countries.

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: My father worked with the world bank and loaned billions of dollars. The least I can do is loan a few thousand.\r\n\r\nI grew up in Europe, Africa, and Central America and it feels good to help those in the countries where I learned so much.
lender.occupational_info: I am a silicon valley technology guy. I am not a billionaire but I have done fairly well.

lender.name: GISdude
lender.loan_because: To help someone achieve their goal. It must be immensely satisfying for a person that comes from poverty that I can\'t even imagine to become a successful business person.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: A gift was given to me from my son & his family who are Kiva supporters. It was a wonderful gift and I want to pass it along in hopes that others will do the same.
lender.occupational_info: We take people on hunting & fishing trips who would like to go with someone who knows the area. It is called outfitting & guiding and is a business that allows us to be outdoors a lot! It is often difficult to do the simple things, like laundry, when you are in the backcountry. Dee encourages others to help out when you can and smile much.

lender.name: Lookout Mobile
lender.loan_because: Lookout Mobile loans because we feel that all people, from any country, should have access to funds that will support their dreams, aspirations, creativity and sustainability. We encourage all Australian people to do the same...
lender.occupational_info: Coming soon

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Stig & family
lender.loan_because: Micro loans is probably the best way to support people in need
lender.occupational_info: Supporting people in our company to achieve their best.

lender.name: marthianne
lender.loan_because: A small good deed could change someones life forever.
lender.occupational_info: I love to travel and also do volunteer work. The most rewarding work I've ever done is the volunteer work.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It helps people that need help. They deserve to live a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I represent sales from companies to the companies wanting to buy the products.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Every one deserves a chance at economic freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the military.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have more than I would ever really need. Kiva is a beautiful way to put resources to use!

lender.name: Shane McP
lender.loan_because: It is a hand up, not a hand out. People just need a chance to prove themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I currently run a computer repair company in the United States but I intend to start other companies as time goes on.

lender.name: Greg & Negin
lender.loan_because: we figure if we can\'t be entrepreneurs ourselves, we should support people who can.
lender.occupational_info: Greg is a graduate student working on his PhD in Computer Science. Negin is a Criminalist who gathers and test samples from crime scenes to put the bad guys away.

lender.name: Tore Brevik
lender.loan_because: I think farmers around the world should get a opportunity to develope their farms to supply their families with all their needs.
lender.occupational_info: Farmer with milk and meat as the main production at the farm. Married with four fosterkids living with us on the farm at the moment.

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the single most effective form of poverty alleviation.

lender.name: hanxue
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better himself/herself
lender.occupational_info: I provide IT solutions to a multi-national company

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great concept to help others around the world.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God with health, wealth and happiness and I wish to share a little bit of these with those who were not given the blessings that I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired entrepreneur who is willing to give help to aspiring entrepreneurs throughout the world. Website link below shows where my loans are at work.

lender.name: Silvana
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to go through hard times. I am from Bulgaria and my family has experienced financial problems in the early 90s. I think that helping out in this way is a really cool idea and has a huge potential worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: PhD student in Economics.

lender.name: Nick Lucking
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans to the 3rd world interest me.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, Artist, Web-Developer

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: A Christian man is the most free lord of all, and subject to none; a Christian man is the most dutiful servant of all, and subject to every one. --Martin Luther, 1520
lender.occupational_info: My name's Anthony. I live in Orlando and I've studied microfinance/microcredit for three years with the hope of learning enough to start a nonprofit. I like lending cash to the food and agriculture sectors... farms, groceries, bakeries, cafes, markets, etc Brave women starting indie businesses are more likely to receive funding, but I'm also happy to fund groups and collectives. You should watch this great documentary, Globalisation is Good, by former anarchist Johann Norberg: http://tinyurl.com/5ea5ug and read his book In Defense of Global Capitalism Feel free to message me to discuss microfinance and share new ideas

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel better to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in customer service for Fresh Start Bakeries which supplies bread to major fast food chains. I process orders for Jack-In-The-Box . I am also married with five children. I know and understand that it is not always easy and every little bit helps.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It's all about giving a helping hand and being a part of something outside of myself

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: I've been through hard times with very little money for essentials, but I didn't have the entrepreneurial spirit of the people on the KIVA website. My admiration goes out to them.
lender.occupational_info: I order books for my company.

lender.name: Bree
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans are one of the best ways to empower people and begin to alleviate poverty throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I lead adventure trips around the world for a company called Explore Worldwide. Check them out at www.explore.co.uk

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I respect people who are hard-working and honest.

lender.name: Sren Alexander
lender.loan_because: I like the thoughts behind micro financing and think this is my way to make a sustainable difference in this world
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Copenhagen Business School studying Auditing

lender.name: Tim Travis
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that in some small way I am helping to improve the quality of life for these hard-working entreprenuers and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entreprenuer--starting up a business--much like those who we support through Kiva.

lender.name: Tuck
lender.loan_because: To help people with their living
lender.occupational_info: i go to school for learning. I\'m in first grade.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I have everything I need.
lender.occupational_info: I study physics at a university. I have great hopes for science and equality.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: \"We can\'t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.\" Dr. Loretta Scott

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a High tech company.

lender.name: Dr. John and Marcia
lender.loan_because: We want to share the blessings of our life with others. This idea is so beautiful in its\' simplicity, what a wonderful way to share the LOVE and change the world!
lender.occupational_info: Operate Center of Life Chiropractic and Pilates Studio in a small town in Maryland and participate in global chiropractic out-reach missions. The practice incorporates an Honor Fee that allows all individuals to access care regardless of economic situation.

lender.name: Harmony
lender.occupational_info: I test computer software programs and am passionate about the pursuit of software quality.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and feel good about themselves and what they are able to do.
lender.occupational_info: When people have had difficult and terrible things happen in their lives, I try to help them have better lives through talk and other kinds of therapy. These therapies help to change the way we view ourselves and the world, and lead to healing.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: When I needed it, Someone gave me a leg up. ________Beware Of the Penguins!!!!!_______
lender.occupational_info: My company does electrical & computer wiring for businesses and homes.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans stand a chance at changing lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and instructions that help people understand how to use technology, like computer software or cell phones.

lender.name: Lyle & Zach
lender.loan_because: What better way than to help those who are taking steps to change their world. When all is said and done, it is the small gestures to complete strangers that matter the most. It restores our humanity and it feels just great. It also helps my son Zach understand that he also can contribute through our combined loan and make a difference.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: In a recent trip to South Africa, I had a chance to visit seveal rural HIV clinics. In that trip I saw first hand the devastation of AIDS epidemic in Sub-Saharan Africa. Although we are far from a mdical cure, one of the mitigating factors in spread of HIV is poverty. This picture was taken in front of one of the clinics.

lender.name: Emily aka crazycakes
lender.loan_because: a little $$ to me is a lot to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: i have a small business. i make all sorts of pretty things to sell.

lender.name: Celine
lender.loan_because: Je prete car je veux supporter les gens qui sont prets a travailler fort pour aider leur famille.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: After travelling to East Africa and seeing what needs there are and how much I have been blessed with, I want to provide for those who are trying to make a better life for themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who have lost their ability to communicate after having a brain injury.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Social Entrepreneurship is the only model that will work in bringing the developing countries to our economic levels. We are also starting businesses and want to help others that need entrepreneurial experience.
lender.occupational_info: We are business students across Canada that refill and sell recycled ink cartridges to other students across Canada!

lender.name: philip
lender.loan_because: When I needed help, people unselfishly came to my needs, Through the grace of god, I can now give back.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: it is a privilege to do so.

lender.name: Calvin & Patty
lender.loan_because: I believe the Bible teaches that meeting the needs of others demonstrates Gods love in a practical way. Also, I needed help once and others helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures and sells drawer slides / hardware for kitchen cabinetry and office furniture.

lender.name: Lauren & Owen
lender.loan_because: it gives us a chance to make a difference in this world, no matter how old we are
lender.occupational_info: We are in school. Lauren is in grade 5, Owen is in grade 1.

lender.name: Wilkinson Family
lender.loan_because: We want our boys to learn the importance of caring for and supporting others. We are all human with the same basic needs --- food, clothing, shelter, health care, and a job. It's our responsibility as citizens of the world to help elevate those who lack these basic needs.

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: the whole world is my backyard

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me the a gift of a Kiva loan for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I organize workers in Texas, United States.

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: I work in the internet industry and I love to see how the internet can bring us all closer together. I respect hard work, no matter where in the world .
lender.occupational_info: Internet Marketing Executive

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much, I want to give as freely.

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: There are economic solutions to human problems.
lender.occupational_info:
I finished my degree in International Business and Management at Dickinson College; my studies also include Latin-American studies, Economics, Spanish and Portuguese.
Today, I am an Engineer officer in the US Army, deployed to Operation Enduring Freedom.

lender.name: Abhijit
lender.loan_because: we all need to.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: I believe people should have the opportunity to beter their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of patients in an outpatient clinic in a small town in California.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I see Kiva as a good opportunity to help others in the time of need. A step closer to global prosperity, with one entrepreneur at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am the go-to guy when people are having problems wth their systems.

lender.name: Eric Skotmyr
lender.occupation: What ever needs to be done.
lender.loan_because: Being human, I am embarrassed by the state of the World and my efforts to date, let alone my inability to better it. If I was in need ... I would hope to find a self empowering opportunity like KIVA to better my life.
lender.occupational_info: I have done many jobs in many fields. My training is in design, photography and the printing industry but I am fortunate enough to afford time now to explore my artistic inspirations ... I am rehabing an old house in some new ways, and renting it to low income tenants and studying renewable lifestyles that offer hope for change. Too little too late?

lender.name: tiffany
lender.loan_because: I can. I\'ve seen how much a dollar can do and I would like to help those that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I\\\'m a current college student who aspires to travel and do business.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: Life is about interacting with people not merely reacting to them.

lender.name: Uyen
lender.loan_because: i wanna.

lender.name: Josh & Melissa
lender.occupational_info: A Student and a Nurse

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: Eventhough we all go through hard times it is important to remeber that there are people who are less fortunate than us and who we can help. Knowing that I brought a smile to someone\'s face at the end of the day makes me smile too.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently an at home mom, who dedicates all her time to the little love of her life.

lender.name: Oliver & Susanne
lender.loan_because: Our small contribution is combined with others, which can do so much more then we can do alone.
lender.occupational_info:
Oliver is a project manager for the New Jersey Early Intervention System.
Susanne is an Occupational Therapist. She works with grade school children to help them achieve.

lender.name: Maxime Dieudonn
lender.occupational_info: Audit

lender.name: Lori, Mike, Mac + Sawyer
lender.loan_because: We want to help other families.
lender.occupational_info: Happy.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: My wife Leslie and I sing songs "to lift spirits and soothe souls"--a combination of folk, traditional, and gospel.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Small loans can greatly improve lives
lender.occupational_info: I travel the world and see how lucky I am compared to most of the people on our planet

lender.name: Vermont Family
lender.occupational_info: Training and education in methods of psychology from Japan

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: The journey of a thousand miles begins with the first step.
lender.occupational_info: Customer Relations Manager

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Assisting and connecting with other people around the world is awesome. I give with gratitude for the blessings in my life.
lender.occupational_info: Nonprofit

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love this idea!
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a computer programmer helping corporations desgin web sites.

lender.name: The Barsches
lender.loan_because: we are entrepreneurs and admire the entrepreneurial spirit in others.
lender.occupational_info: We own a variety of Internet ventures.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: this seems like such a great idea. It's great to be harnessing the technology of the internet in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own internet business.

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: I believe that this program gives people the opportunity to overcome poverty through hard work. The money that is loaned gives them a goal to reach, which in my opinion is the greatest motivator in providing for family and self to make a better life possible
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a full time student at Houston Baptist University and work full time at the Weekley Family YMCA. At the Y I work in membership and plan on entering the Y\'s international and outreach program

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: When I heard about this I thought it was such a simple way of helping thosewho want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Health Kinesiology and train other people to become therapists. Health Kinesiology is aprofound but simple healing modality.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: It\'s an easy way to show support to our Brothers and Sisters who are trying to get ahead and help their communities too.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I received the initial $100 as a Christmas gift a few years ago. Since then I have diligently kept up with the businesses I've loaned to. I've now loaned to 6 different businesses and looking to put more money into my lender account!
lender.occupational_info: I oversee sales agents who reserve vacations for guests at Copper Mountain Resort in Colorado - a leading ski resort in North America

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others an opportunity to make a difference in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I offer people a simple way of adding more fruits and vegetables to their daily diet. Eating a whole food, plant based diet is the key to being healthy.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: it's really the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an investment bank as an analyst who invests in companies that we hope will produce new medicine to treat disease.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I really want to help people if I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at West Virginia University.

lender.name: Dimitri
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to save money on products they already use and I help people to make more money.

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving the fishing net instead of the fish.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping
lender.occupational_info: Middle Manager in a company that provides environmental services to industrial and commercial businesses

lender.name: Danielle Fragale
lender.loan_because: I think one should always help others. And here at Kiva, I can help people even if I have very little amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time at a restaurant. I take orders from the customers and I write them down. Then I pass it onto the chef who prepares the order. When done, he passes me the order and I deliver it to the customers. I also go to college and I hope to be a veterinarian doctor someday.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our responsibility to help those who had the misfortune not to be born into one of the richest countries of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Lyme Disease ended my career as professional weaver so I am trying to feed my artistic self through painting instead.

lender.name: Bowen Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help others.

lender.name: Stephanie Demery
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Improving relationships and lives.

lender.name: Dickie
lender.loan_because: I love helping people and we have been so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the small town we live in. I just help things run properly behind the scenes like roads,the sewer system, maintaining parks, etc..

lender.name: Little Lenders
lender.loan_because: We loan to make the world a better place

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: because the greatest amount of people can be lifted up economically by capitalism
lender.occupational_info: recruiting and giving smart creative people a vehicle to better themselves, the people who purchase our services and the investors in our company

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: i loan through kiva because it allows me to see that i am contributing to the sustainability of a community. "Freedom in one area seems to help to foster freedom in others." - Amartya Sen
lender.occupational_info: i study philosophy as a graduate student.

lender.name: Chris's family
lender.loan_because: Gods Grace
lender.occupational_info: I build communities

lender.name: D & D
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we enjoying giving back. It's a wonderful feeling to know that you are helping someone who has no where to turn to better their life and the lives of their families. It is our hope that they too will eventually be able to share with others. We try to pattern our lives after that of our Lord & savior, Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: to help make a differrence in the world.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I was given an oppertunity.
lender.occupational_info: I build communities, not just houses, but a place where people love and support each other.

lender.name: Kristina Williams
lender.occupation: Wife of a Farmer (cattle, sheep, citrus)
lender.loan_because: To encourage fair trading practices and offer encouragement to other agricultural farmers.
lender.occupational_info: We trade cattle and sheep on our 1,100 acre hill country farm. We also grow 100 acres of oranges, mandarines and lemons.

lender.name: kay
lender.loan_because: Microcredit has always made sense to me, from the time I first learned about it while I was teaching an environmental science class. And my loans honor those who made loans to me when I was in need.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my mother and my husband, garden, work in the library and sew.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People can take pride in their lives when they take pride in their work. Handouts do not do this, business loans (structured the right way) do.
lender.occupational_info: Always a student... Though I've realized that doing good should have a clear purpose.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can afford a little to make a difference.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Develop software for satellites that monitor long term global climate change.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: everyone needs to help the rest of the world.

lender.name: Jayron & Danny
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Kindergarten in a multicultural school. My husband is a graduate student.

lender.name: Derrick & Hayley
lender.loan_because: in an increasingly networked world we can and should.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ideas I have ever heard about. This is an idea that can actually do something to help people and the world. I don't usually care as most ideas are to macro to be useful. This project gets money to the people who need it directly, to help their businesses grow.

lender.name: Jackson
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: One day I would like to have my own business...combining my love of photography, textiles, and jewelry design. In the meantime I would like to loan to other creative souls - Seeing them succeed will hopefully galvanize me to eventually start my own business.
lender.occupational_info: I currently help companies with their marketing efforts, via their web site, emails, and mail.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: There's no better way to reach out and touch another life halfway around the world
lender.occupational_info: I manage and preserve historical documents for future generations.

lender.name: Birgitte
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a man a fishing rod instead of givning him a fish, the rod will be able to feed him and his family and will give him the opportunity to sell at the local market.\r\nIn that way he can help his fellow citizens, the animals and the nature surrounding him, in the long run.\r\n
lender.occupational_info: Se the above :)

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: I support the idea of being self sufficient. If lending money makes a difference, than here you go!
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help people find their drives and passion and put those into effect! I also support company management to determine their strategy and move them in a place where they can be the best they can be.

lender.name: De Zwerver
lender.loan_because: Finally I\'ve have found a direct way to help a little bit. I do believe in adding microcredit to the common ways in developing the poorer areas of the world. Hopefully more people will following the KIVA.org!
lender.occupational_info: Travelling the world as a tourleader in the past and now selling travelguides and -maps to other travellers in my specialized travelbookshop in the northern part of Holland (city of Groningen), I feel myself responsible for the world around me. That\'s the main reason to join KIVA

lender.name: Guirec
lender.loan_because: J'ai trouv l'approche de Kiva trs sduisante, m'offrant une possibilit d'essayer une voie alternative de contribution au financement de projets, que j'espre plus directement efficace. Hablo espaol. I am speaking english.
lender.occupational_info: Je travaille dans une agence de Coopration au Dveloppement.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I am an English Language teacher from Alaska.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I don't want the money and they do.
lender.occupational_info: I learn.

lender.name: Charlann
lender.loan_because: I want families to be able to provide an education for their children.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to have a more direct involvement with the causes I support. I firmly believe in microlending as the most powerful and direct way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage business relationships across North and South America, promoting open source (Linux) software.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it feels like I can really make a difference to someone\'s life
lender.occupational_info: I use Health kinesiology and Bowen Technique to help people improve their health, wellbeing and personal development

lender.name: Lory
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information to improve thier lives, make thier jobs easier and help expand thier minds.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me

lender.name: Defrance
lender.loan_because: I travelled in these countries and want to help them.

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupational_info: All about helping people & improving quality of live.

lender.name: Wood Family
lender.loan_because: The more we look around the world, the more fortunate we realize we are. We want to give back to the world and feel that Kiva is an ideal tool for giving.

lender.name: massimo
lender.loan_because: God is not going to ask me how much money I made, but He will probably ask me how I used the money to help the others. Last summer I spent 1 month in Sierra Leone (West Africa) in a catholic mission supporting activities with children. It was a special experience: a different world is not possible, IT IS NECESSARY!!
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved in engineering industrialization of parts and components (from the prototype to the start of production) for bio-medical devices (hemodialysis systems)

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because:
I can.
I like giving a hand up instead of a hand out.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It allows me to make an impact on the world around me by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with for a socially responsible investment firm that believes in giving clients the ability to make money as well as use their ownership to promote social change in a variety of ways.

lender.name: Jesper
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and make it possible for others to support themselves.

lender.name: Andrew & Lindsay
lender.loan_because: God has given us much, and we want to pass that along to the rest of His children!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's fun. It makes me feel good. It's a small price to pay to make a difference.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I would like to make the world a better place by helping people who are willing to help themselves.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and this seems like a promising enterprise to help those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Supervise the loading and unloading of ships.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: Neo-mercantilism needs to end.
lender.occupational_info: Double-checking the financial reports of big companies to make sure they are properly following the rules.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: The world is here for us to love
lender.occupational_info: Helping discover how computers can help us focus more on enjoying our lives

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It feels good! Helping someone to gather the resources to launch their dreams is fulfilling.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I am curious & I want to enable business & growth in the world
lender.occupational_info: be active, not reactive

lender.name: Nader
lender.loan_because: we need to step into areas of recognition our government consistently fails to
lender.occupational_info: I work in Countrwide Home Loan\\\'s, biggest mortage company, joint venture department to build relationships for the growth of the company\\\'s market share.

lender.name: RnJ
lender.loan_because: We want to give people around the world an opportunity to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: One of us designs and writes computer software for financial institutions and the other is a clinical psychologist.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can connect with people in a positive way and do my part (however small) to change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I design, build, and write about information systems and how to use them to have fun, make money and learn to live with our planet and each other.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: I desire to Make Poverty History and want to do my part to see it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team of software developers.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Postmaster in a small town post office.

lender.name: Joey
lender.occupational_info: I provide interns and teens the opportunity to live and work in the wilderness.

lender.name: John and Karla
lender.loan_because: We\'re grateful for all we have .....
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan for the future.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: Never before has there existed a way for us to make such a direct contribution to creating individual success and assisting in economic growth around the world. How can one not become a Kiva Lender?
lender.occupational_info:
I have had ALS (Lou Gerhigs disease) for nine years, statistically I should have been dead long ago While I am paralyzed from my neck down I am still able to operate my wheel chair and computer and I find that I can inspire those recently stricken with the disease That is now my job.
odessaguy@yahoo.com

lender.name: Smoothride
lender.loan_because: It is important to support others. Kiva is a great example of tapping the human spirit by offering a hand up, rather than just a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Smoothride encourages you... to THINK. to ACT. to LOVE.

lender.name: Eric Hanna
lender.loan_because: Charity is not a solution for poverty, enabling someone to work for themselves is.
lender.occupational_info: Online Media Buying and Optimization across multi-channel media spends.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I love helping others. I fund kiva with money that I earn on ebay.
lender.occupational_info: I work with special needs children ages 14 to 21 at a High School. I am also a parent of a autisic son.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: it makes up for other things I do - trying to even out the balance sheet!

lender.name: Eric W. Miller
lender.occupation: Student, Father, Husband, and Faithful Christian
lender.loan_because: I love to give. I intend on reinvesting all, which is paid back to me, into loans for others on this site.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student and I work part time at The Gallup Organization, where I call bank customers to analyze their satisfaction with their branch.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: Good business is good development.\\r\\n- Grameen Phone
lender.occupational_info: I am in grad school learning how to support and encourage development in areas of the world where people live on less than $2 a day.

lender.name: Tina and PJ
lender.loan_because: It is something so seemingly small and simple that has the potential to make the life of a stranger a little better.
lender.occupational_info: PJ is a lecturer in physics in Austin, TX. Tina is an attorney in Austin, TX.

lender.name: Smart Baitani
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe John F Kenedy was right when he said "...asking His blessings and His help, but knowing that here on earth God's work must truly be our own." (JFK, January 20,1961) And another man wisely said: "You make a living by what you get but a life by what you give." (Winston Churchill).
lender.occupational_info: Born and raised in Bukoba, Tanzania. After graduating his MBA (Projects Management/Entrepreneurship) from Minnesota, Smart decided to start a nonprofit, called COSAD so that he could closely play a role in creating vibrant communities in rural Tanzania.Since 2001 COSAD has been developing various empirical business models using yet holistic and Appreciative Inquiry (IA) approaches in pioneering solutions that can lead into creation of sustainable grassroots entrepreneurship.COSAD, Inc: (Compassionate Solutions for Africa\'s Development) is a Minnesota based 501 (c) 3 nonprofit organization devoted to empowering individuals by providing support and innovative solutions through community projects development.

lender.name: alain
lender.loan_because: I think Micro credit is one of the most effictive way to reduce poverty in the long run.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy water and crayons.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I have been given a tremendous opportunity to make a living and provide for my family. I want to extend that opportunity to others around the world.

lender.name: Lora
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all change the world, even if it\'s only a little at a time. I want to leave this planet a better place for all of our children.
lender.occupational_info: My most important work is helping my little girl find her place in this world. I am also a literature teacher and write for magazines periodically. I am currently working on a novel for young people.

lender.name: Michael & Karen
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sell very expensive British automobiles and my wife works harder taking care of our family.

lender.name: Parminder
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business and stand on your own. This can only happen when people help people. We are trying to do our part.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small manufacturing business. We manufacture wires and cables for homes, music systems, audio, automotive, controls etc. All certified to standards.

lender.name: KAW and JWA
lender.loan_because: Hay que compartir el cario.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: This is the best thing i have seen. The time of empowerment to do good and have a positive impact on the world for every person has come. \"There is nothing I can do.\" is no longer an acceptable response. The world will be what we all make of it.
lender.occupational_info: I use CAD to design point of purchase displays out of corrugated paper (card board for the non industry people). If I am feeling clever I explain it as Industrial Origami.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people\'s lives and how better than sharing what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I plan what a software program looks like and acts when it loads onto your machine and you use it.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: The big banks won't and sometimes people need a little capital to make it through this world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an engineer but I also own a small business, so I understand the challenges of working for yourself.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Vinko+Colette
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are privileged and happy. To some people this loan could change their lives. We want to see change.
lender.occupational_info: My work makes me happy, I am lucky to enjoy it not just need it. + I dream every day because I try to solve the worlds problems.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: We are giving back to God, to the society

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I'm in the people business.
lender.occupational_info: I love books and hope to ignite that passion in others.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help people. It's also nice to teach kids about sociology, business, geography and sharing.
lender.occupational_info: Homemaker.

lender.name: Arjun
lender.loan_because: there's no reason not to!
lender.occupational_info: i do lots of things to help make it easier for people to buy, sell, and talk about their homes.

lender.name: Lucy and Brian
lender.loan_because: its a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small business providing bookkeeping and accountancy services.

lender.name: Klaas
lender.loan_because: I think this way my money makes a little difference where it should.

lender.name: Rick & Missy
lender.loan_because: once upon a time, I used to borrow
lender.occupational_info: We both own our own retail businesses

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I'd want somebody to do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: US Marine.

lender.name: Birkus
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: It is important to share the wealth of the world with those who are less fortunate and committed to making a better lives for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect the interests of my employer by ensuring legal compliance and sound business practices.

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to a better world and I love Kiva\'s personal approach. It\'s the best investment I can imagine!
lender.occupational_info: After 20 years of work in IT and management consultancy, I\'m now looking for other ways to help people grow.

lender.name: Kerri Arsenault
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am investigating ways to implement, collaborate, or advise on media and discourse in the occupied Palestinian territories in order to foster the democratic principles of freedom of expression as a means for positive social change.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer consultant, programming all types of computer systems for large IT-companies.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to try and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a business newspaper, feature stories for magazines, and also do some technical writing.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love working directly with business people who are investing and growing their business. Kiva is a fantastic idea. I am thrilled to be a small part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people grow their companies.

lender.name: Angela Lin
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone gain true financial independence, for them and their family.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I loan on Kiva because I want to help people in less developed countries. I like the fact that you know who your loan goes to and what the purpose of the loan is.
lender.occupational_info: Financial Analyst who loves to work with technology startups

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Kiva puts the money into the hands of those who need it.

lender.name: Val
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives, and I want to see the difference that I make.
lender.occupational_info: Veterinary Technician educator

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: These entrepeneurs should be supported because they want to be economic independent in difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: As a management assistent I am the eyes, ears and hands of the management team.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: It is much more empowering and honoring than a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the director of a non-profit that seeks sustainable, holistic transformation of urban poor communities.

lender.name: Claragrace
lender.loan_because: \"Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it.\"--Gandhi

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I have empathy for fellow farmers, working in a harsh environment.
lender.occupational_info: I was a soil scientist advising farmers mainly in Scotland on soil improvement.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a reasonable lifestyle.\r\nProjects like this make the web such an exciting place to work!
lender.occupational_info: Internet Application developer

lender.name: Bill Stenlake
lender.loan_because: It is sustainable and I believe it helps others determined to succeed. I hope it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I now devote my time to writing. I have written several books and have more in the pipeline

lender.name: Laraine
lender.loan_because: Small-scale, community-based cooperation can make significant change.
lender.occupational_info: help build stronger communities

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I can! You should, too!
lender.occupational_info: Busy bee!

lender.name: Denis & Anne
lender.loan_because: The grassroots structure of this project is very appealing.

lender.name: Hans-Juergen
lender.loan_because: I have more than others. So there is a need, to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engaged manager in the energy business, all day long. It is a great job!

lender.name: Seminoles
lender.loan_because: We are a group of 3rd and 1st graders in Pleasanton, CA. We belong to a \"tribe\" and collect Wampum (i.e. money for good causes) at each monthly meeting. We feel very fortunate and would like to help others in the world live a better life.

lender.name: Andy & Kathy Bridgeman
lender.loan_because: these business owners, by their hard work, can improve the lives of their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: insurance agency

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunities they desire.
lender.occupational_info: I separate air traffic.

lender.name: Gustavo
lender.loan_because: We have all been given the ability to make a difference in another person's life - if we can become aware of that ability, we gain the power to shape the future.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies determine the best strategy to provide exceptional customer service by using the latest telecommunication and internet technology.

lender.name: Timothy & Bethany
lender.loan_because: We loan because we like to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
Tim manages ways that business data is structured, secured, and how it functions with technology. He also finds new ways to use technology to may life easier on users in his network.
Beth is an assistant to a hospital executive and a graduate student in the U.S. studying literary theory.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Jessica and Alan
lender.loan_because: I think we all need to take the initiative to help our fellow human beings. This is a neat and effective way to do so.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe most people do not want charity, they simply want a fair chance to mobilize their skills to provide for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I start and grow high technology companies.

lender.name: Cole
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea
lender.occupational_info: I work to supply natural gas for heating homes and for cooking fuel

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: Somebody has to.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea, and because at this point in my life, I can.
lender.occupational_info: As a mediator, I help people to solve problems between themselves, so they can stay away from court or violence.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful idea and it makes me happy to participate.

lender.name: Sandi & Phil
lender.loan_because: I can. And I've benefited from the generosity of others who have loaned to me. I love that Kiva provides loans to those who normally wouldn't 'quality' for a loan from a bank.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them be happier and more self sufficient. My husband works with businesses who need assistance planning technology changes.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: My faith informs me that I am my brother's keeper, sharing God's love by lighting even one small candle.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from working to create jobs for people with disabilities.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: when people in developing countries have the courage to be entrepreneurs, it inspires me.
lender.occupational_info: I help build water treatment facilities.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves...
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in writing, directing and producing independent film and video

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe wealth breeds stability
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager

lender.name: Ofer and Petra
lender.loan_because: We loan because we saw the Frontline program highlighting KIVA. The website went down for some time, but Petra's Mom got Christmas gift certificates for us so we are finally on board. Petra was a student in Kenya and has a special passion for the country.
lender.occupational_info: Petra works with graduate students at a large University and Ofer is an information technology consultant.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help someone have a better life.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: People need help. God has blessed His people abundantly and we are bound by His command to "Do unto others as you would have others do unto you."
lender.occupational_info: I can no longer work. A chronic and terminal illness has forced me to retire on a very small monthly pension. This KIVA organization allows me to do some good with what little I have.

lender.name: Joan & John
lender.loan_because: We like the philosophy and practice of microfinance and helping provide an opportunity for people who may not otherwise be able to develop their business.

lender.name: Sherri-Ann
lender.loan_because: I became empassioned for KIVA after studying AIDS & Kenya for a graduate degree in international health
lender.occupational_info: I have been a registered nurse for at least 13 years, at least 10 of those years were in the United States Air Force.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: I loan because all my problems are First World problems.
lender.occupational_info: I make neat things on the internet.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: God is good and has blessed us beyond measure. Loving others & giving someone a helping hand that enables them to improve their lives sums up Christ's teachings.

lender.name: Sammy
lender.loan_because: I like to help others

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people who are less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and my favorite sport is basketball.

lender.name: Robin F.
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother to a ten month old daughter, Sofia.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around!
lender.occupational_info: I help protect American Agriculture.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: It's important to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations make plans for the future.

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: I think self help is the way for people to improve themselves. There's nothing like having "your own bucks on the line" to ensure motivation.
lender.occupational_info: I was executive director of marketing for tourism in nova scotia before retiring. I helped create over 20,000 jobs in my province in the tourism sector.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I believe that the greatest injustice of all is the fact that the wealthier you are, the cheaper it is live, build and make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I finance small technology companies in Europe

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: i support markets
lender.occupational_info: economics and numbers

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help the poor in africa
lender.occupational_info: I go to a Quaker school called Tandem Friends in Charlottesville,Virginia.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to help and I love the stories.
lender.occupational_info: I attend school for the first half of each day and participate on the local rowing team in the evening.

lender.name: Gary and Patty
lender.loan_because: We would like to help people less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: We teach at Santa Clara University School of Law in Santa Clara, California.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Our Chavarah((Jewish friends) who number 14 persons decided to give to some needy citizens of the world who can really use some investments to continue improving their lives on this planet.

lender.name: Denice
lender.occupational_info: Create and revise documents pertaining to the workings of an imaging company.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: Early in my career I was helped by a number of people who provided advice and support, some who I knew and others I did not. I want to help others around the world improve and expand their business.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Property Manager in Downtown Washington, DC acting as the Landlord for a large office building located on Pennsylvania Avenue close to the White House.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Contributing funds for the microcapitalization of entrepreneurs in areas underserviced by other lenders is a great way to promote sustainable economic success.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a PhD student in medieval European history. I focus on the history of medieval scientific philosophy.

lender.name: ragnar
lender.loan_because: i can, and because the need is there. i love peoples' goals and the various ways they're working to make them happen. the stories are great
lender.occupational_info: i work with the taproot foundation, which strengthens nonprofits by engaging business professionals in pro bono service.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I'm an economics teacher and my passion is development economics, it seems like a truly innovative way to help those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school kids

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the lives of other people who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a newly-retired teacher of students age 14-18. I like to travel, walk, camp, read, and ride my bike.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: We are all connected!

lender.name: Education for Ministry
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help lend a hand to our neighbors near and far.
lender.occupational_info: We study the Bible in light of our day to day lives.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: "Even a poor man is entitled to some happiness." -Fiddler on the Roof

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: people need the opportunity.

lender.name: St. Scholastica
lender.occupational_info: The "seven social sins": Knowledge without character Science without humanity Wealth without work Commerce without morality Politics without principles Pleasure without conscience Worship without self-sacrifice - Mahatma Gandhi

lender.loan_because: I want to be part of something bigger than my small corner of the world.
lender.occupational_info: My goal is to help children reach their potential.

lender.name: Aftab
lender.loan_because:
I want to be part of the solution!
If someone is able and willing to risk their time and efforts into starting a new business, I admire that quality very much.
lender.occupational_info: A business owner who has been very lucky so far.

lender.name: darian
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: bethe
lender.loan_because: i am fortunate enough to be able to help others.

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: It's a way to pass on the many blessings I have received in my life.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Houghton
lender.loan_because: I strongly support this new model of donation - microlending and microentrepreneur
lender.occupational_info: I am now a Strategic Advisor of one of the Social Enterprises in Hong Kong.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in helping fellow entrepreneurs and business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase high volume ingredients for food manufacturing companies.

lender.name: Sandra and Jonathan
lender.loan_because: We want to afford people opportunity to have a prosperous life.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because: I believe Poverty is the single largest problem in our world today. If People weren't hungry, we wouldn't kill each other quite as often.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian Pastor and I am really excited about what God had done for me in my life. I just want the opportunity to Give back to people who have had less opportunity than I. I love toys and going shopping for electronic things I don't need...Kiva is a way for me to sacrifice those purchases for someone else.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: when you put good into this world, you receive good from it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Speech Pathologist.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I am happy to do it.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: It is such a simple way to help people. For what you can spend on dinning out, you can help really make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Gwan-Liong
lender.loan_because: believe in: When I was hungry, you gave food; When I was thirsty, you gave me drink; When I was .............; however more in the modern version: When I had no colateral, you microfinanced me (for a chance to help myself out of poverty).
lender.occupational_info: Recently retired, investments; not only in financial, but also in human capabilities to help themselves.

lender.name: Sherry Tinsman
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward.....
lender.occupational_info: I design and make jewelry. I'm inspired by nature so my themes are based mostly on flowers and vines.

lender.name: Sam & Roberta Martin
lender.loan_because: I am convinced Kiva is one of the better organizations out there helping people. You choose where your money goes and when it is paid back you can choose again. These are people who are working to improve their lives not looking for charity.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: It's my trade off for pirating music. More honestly, I could think of absolutely no worthwhile reason not to, despite my best efforts.
lender.occupational_info: Studying the convergence of software and politics.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love the microfinance as an economic development tool. I also love watching a business grow and I'm glad to be a part of helping it get started.
lender.occupational_info: I train, lead, and manage a sales office comprised of 15-20 sales reps. My goal is to develop individuals to expand into new markets for our clients.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: What a great thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor, especially trained to treat people with painful conditions. I also use acupuncture and herbal medicine in my practice.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, help others!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and sit around in a class room with 20 other students and learn stuff.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because:
Because entrepreneurship, innovation and the human spirit are not limited by geography and that capitalism is the undeniable source of self-improvement, freedom and liberty.
All I ask is that when you find success you use your resources to improve your community and the world we all live in. Share you knowledge with those around you, empower neighbors, insuring that when the tide rises, all boats rise.
lender.occupational_info:
Currently, I am producing a feature documentary on the Chicago Cubs. Its been a fantastic experience. My partners and I have several films in production and also finance documentaries and low budget independents.
In addition, we fund small to medium sized ventures. We look for entrepreneurs that share our values and ideals. I also spend a lot of time volunteering here at home. Giving back and helping others will always keep your heart in tune, I believe that.

lender.name: Umbreen
lender.loan_because: I think its the right way to get real, radical change and to correct the imbalance we see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a website that let's people connect to buy and sell cars.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I work for the socially conscious clothing company, Edun. Our focus is to help Africa (and other 3rd world areas) build a better economy, and future through trade, education, and technical skills. I design Men's clothing for the brand, and then help the factories develop the clothes.

lender.name: Barbara and Lexa
lender.loan_because: I believe in microlending as a source of capital to businesses such as these
lender.occupational_info: My working life was with a government agency devoted to helping entrepreneurs and I continue to volunteer with a SCORE a national organization with that purpose.

lender.name: nathan xaviar
lender.loan_because: This is a way for me to give back. I remember when I was in need of a loan.
lender.occupational_info: We invest in real estate properties across the United States. We have properties listed in Indiana, Pennsylvania, Ohio and New York. If interested in purchasing rehabbed & newly remodeled properties e-mail us at magnanimoushyip@hotmail.com

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Advising organizations how to plan and succeed

lender.name: Gerhard
lender.loan_because: Give some one a fish and you feed them for a day. Teach them to fish and you feed them for a lifetime. Perhaps with a loan for better gear they can feed their whole family, and enhance the local economy as well. I believe opportunities like Kiva do just that.

lender.name: Dixie
lender.loan_because: It's easy, it's effective. It's a small contribution by me, but a big impact on someone's livelihood.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need in a very real and personal way.

lender.name: Jeff,Susan & Lily
lender.loan_because: We want to give to people who need it, not the banks.

lender.name: John Elbing
lender.loan_because: I trust the people to know what they need to improve their world. I like the "personal" contact.
lender.occupational_info: I am building a network to enable ridesharing across Europe.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I was given the opportunity by a friend.
lender.occupational_info: entering information into the company's network

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have been born in a country where opportunities for success and a better life run rampant. Other less fortunate individuals across the globe deserve an opportunity to better their lives, and I'm blessed enough to be able to help them in that regard. Thank goodness for Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an I.T. dude. Nobody would understand if I told them. Work Hard -> Play Harder

lender.name: Wingate
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: College Administration

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it was a gift to us at Christmas from our son and his family.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer who does accident reconstruction in the Tampa, FL area

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: everyone should help their neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: Business accounting and administration

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It empowers everyone involved.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org shows you how even a small contribution adds up to make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Steven & Angelina
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many way, I just want to give back. I enjoy helping and voluntering. Thanks KIVA for providing this service.
lender.occupational_info: Operations consultant for banks and financial firms.

lender.name: Carol
lender.occupational_info: I work in Partner Development for a large software company.

lender.name: Niran
lender.loan_because: I believe in 'entrepreneurial spirit' and that access to capital should not slow down the progress of so many people throughout our world.
lender.occupational_info: I examine connections between business and social and environmental issues in a variety of contexts. I do this through teaching, research, and outreach activities at my local university.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I feel we have an obligation to help people in any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hydrologist. I forecast floods to help save lives and reduce property damage.

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher working to help other teachers integrate technology into their curriculum. I work in the public schools in Massachusetts, USA

lender.name: Tahir
lender.loan_because: I want to create wealth and abundance in developing countries
lender.occupational_info: I'm a middleman for insurances and mortgages in the Netherlands

lender.name: Team Pad Thai
lender.loan_because: The group of us loan because we love microbuses, pad thai, and booze. And, most importantly, because we believe in the interconnection among all people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in education, ministry, engineering, and law.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the right to make a living for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer.

lender.name: Carl-Lykke
lender.loan_because: I have the possibility to help.
lender.occupational_info: Like a normal architect designs a house and decides where the rooms should be, which materials to use, and how the house should look, I as an IT Architect, designs computer systems and decides which hardware and software to use, how the system should interact with other systems, and how people can use the system. I don't build the system, but I tell the experts how they should build it. I talk with people!

lender.name: Katherine S
lender.loan_because: This is my wedding gift to my son and daughter in law
lender.occupational_info: I investigate the condition of mechanical, electrical and plumbing systems in buildings

lender.name: Liesje
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed, and others are so in need of just basic food and water for their families. The thought of helping someone with the tools needed to help support themselves and their family gives me such joy.

lender.name: Aneet
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able do so.
lender.occupational_info: I have a living angel in my life who makes me smile and he has inspired me to live an amazing life.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I subscribe to the \"Give a man a fish...\" adage.
lender.occupational_info: I develop applications for users in order to make them more efficient.

lender.name: Steve & Janet
lender.loan_because: We like to help and want to give this a try.
lender.occupational_info: Internet sales and birthplace nursing for new mothers and babies.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to help substance abusers recover from substance abuse.

lender.name: ursula
lender.loan_because: I like to help others. The idea that I can donate so little and yet change someone elses life in a positive way is amazing.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a licensed veterinary technician. Basically a nurse for animals. I work for the ASPCA mobile clinic. We provide free & low cost spay and neuter for animals of owners who are on public assistance.

lender.name: Travis
lender.occupational_info: Reporter/News Producer

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: I manage money, investing it in businesses like the ones we see here, just a bit bigger :)

lender.name: Tyler & James
lender.loan_because: For the cost of one meal, I can help someone support their family. We study economics in high school and college, and teachers always mention 'the poor'; they say there's nothing we can do - through loaning money to those in need, there is something we can do. If I can help to change one person's life, then my loans are worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: Tyler is currently a student, and also works as a website developer. Jimmy is also a student. Our hobbies include photography, politics, and food.

lender.name: Bob and Stef
lender.loan_because: We were inspired by the lending done by our local Church
lender.occupational_info: Stef and I both work at a major pharmaceutical company in the US. While we each have very different jobs we both share a common goal...to help the company discovery, develop and sell new safe medicines around the world.
